document_data.name: Lightal Barnshyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Lightal Barnshyn''' was a [[half-elf]] [[ranger]] in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]] around [[1367 DR]]. She was a caravan outfitter and a sponsor of caravans at [[Watchful Wheels Wagons & Gear]]. She was also an agent of the [[Harpers]] in the city.
